pr_title: Migrate plugin packaging tests to java

timeline.message:
Migrate plugin packaging tests to java

This commit converts the bats tests for the plugin cli into the java
packaging test framework. The new tests only use the example plugin to
test the plugin cli. The tests for each individual plugin's contents
after being installed are handled by a new unit test for the plugin
installer added in #58287.

timeline.author: nik9000

timeline.bodyText:
I don't remember why some of them booted ES and asserted that the example plugin looks good and some didn't. I think what you have here is fine though, just asserting that the installer didn't blow up is probably good enough in these cases so long as we have a single test that asserts that it did indeed install the plugin in all the way. And you have that above.
👍
